startPage.title: What's Your Inner Pie?
startPage.description: In a world where every soul is a slice of pie, discover the flavor that best captures your inner world. Sweet, spicy, dreamy â€” what's your essence?

questions.question: You run a pie shop. A new customer walks in. What do you do?

choices.text: You smile brightly and say, 'What kind of pie are you looking for today?'
You nod politely and quietly wait for them to speak first

questions.question: You're creating a new pie recipe. Your approach is:

choices.text: You recall a dreamy pie you once saw in a dream and follow your imagination
You analyze trends, ingredient costs, and customer reviews

questions.question: An employee accidentally used salt instead of sugar. You:

choices.text: Calmly explain what went wrong and how to fix it next time
Say, 'Itâ€™s okay! Mistakes happen. Letâ€™s try again together'

questions.question: You suddenly get a flood of pie orders! You:

choices.text: Write out inventory, divide tasks, and follow a structured plan
Jump into action â€” just start baking and adjust as you go!

questions.question: You're deciding which pie to showcase today. You choose based on:

choices.text: Best-selling pie based on recent sales and data
The colorful rainbow pie that catches your eye

questions.question: When posting your pie photo on social media, you:

choices.text: Schedule the post, analyze hashtags, and optimize timing
Go with the vibe and post what feels right in the moment

questions.question: A friend asks you to try their new pie and give feedback. You say:

choices.text: 'Itâ€™s a bit bland â€” maybe add more syrup next time'
'Hmm! Very unique! Letâ€™s make another one together soon'

questions.question: You're entering a timed pie contest. You:

choices.text: Set a timer, break the process into steps, and stay on track
Grab your ingredients and bake by feel â€” trust your instincts!

questions.question: A customer says, 'Wow, this pie seems expensive...' You respond:

choices.text: 'Considering the quality and cost, itâ€™s actually a fair price'
'It is, but I poured my heart into it!' with a warm smile

questions.question: When do you feel happiest while making pie?

choices.text: Watching someone enjoy your pie with a smile
Sitting quietly, enjoying the aroma from the oven

questions.question: When you see a new recipe, you:

choices.text: Review the full instructions before starting
Just dive in and check the recipe as you go

questions.question: Youâ€™re invited to a community pie gathering. You:

choices.text: Bring a bunch of pies and chat with everyone
Try a few bites, observe the scene, then leave quietly

questions.question: Your pie suddenly goes viral on the news! You:

choices.text: Start planning your next moves and how to handle demand
Get emotional and celebrate with your friends and family

questions.question: Youâ€™re out of a key ingredient while baking. You:

choices.text: Quickly look for a substitute that fits the flavor profile
Grab something that 'feels right' and improvise the recipe

questions.question: You're launching a new pie. Your style is:

choices.text: Plan out the name, ingredients, and pricing beforehand
Make the pie first and tweak things based on feedback

questions.question: Five minutes before closing, a customer walks in. You:

choices.text: Politely explain that the shop is closing soon
'You're our last customer â€” letâ€™s make it special!'
